00019 #ifndef _IPL98_PIXELGROUPIT_H

00023 #include "../../points/point2d.h"

00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CPixelGroupIterator
00038 {
00039 protected: // attributes
00041     T2DInt* m_pCurr;
00042 public:
00044         CPixelGroupIterator(){ }
00046         CPixelGroupIterator(T2DInt* pCurr) :m_pCurr(pCurr){ }
00048         inline CPixelGroupIterator& operator=(const CPixelGroupIterator& It);
00050         inline CPixelGroupIterator& operator++() {++m_pCurr; return *this;}
00052         inline CPixelGroupIterator operator++(int) {CPixelGroupIterator t = *this; m_pCurr++; return t;}
00054         inline CPixelGroupIterator& operator--() {--m_pCurr; return *this;}
00056         inline CPixelGroupIterator operator--(int) {CPixelGroupIterator t = *this; m_pCurr--; return t;}
00058         inline T2DInt& operator*(){return *m_pCurr;}
00060         inline T2DInt& operator*() const{return *m_pCurr;}
00062         inline T2DInt* operator->(){return m_pCurr;}
00066         inline CPoint2D<INT16> ToCPoint2D(){return CPoint2D<INT16>(m_pCurr->x,m_pCurr->y);}
00069         friend bool operator==(const CPixelGroupIterator& p, const CPixelGroupIterator& q){return p.m_pCurr==q.m_pCurr;}
00072         friend bool operator!=(const CPixelGroupIterator& p, const CPixelGroupIterator& q){return !(p==q);}
00075         friend bool operator<(const CPixelGroupIterator& p, const CPixelGroupIterator& q){return p.m_pCurr<q.m_pCurr;}
00076 };
00077 
00078 
00079 inline CPixelGroupIterator& CPixelGroupIterator::operator=(const CPixelGroupIterator& It)
00080 {
00081         m_pCurr=It.m_pCurr;
00082         return *this;
00083 }

00087 inline bool operator==(const T2DInt& p, const CPoint2D<INT16>& q){return ((p.x==q.GetX()) && (p.y==q.GetY()));}
00090 inline bool operator!=(const T2DInt& p, const CPoint2D<INT16>& q){return ((p.x!=q.GetX()) || (p.y!=q.GetY()));}
00094 inline bool operator<(const T2DInt& p, const CPoint2D<INT16>& q){if (p.x==q.GetX()){return (p.y<q.GetY());}else{return (p.x<q.GetX());}}
